t: HOME | Altenloh, Brinck & Co. U.S., Inc. | Fastening Solutions
s: We at ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO U.S. are proud to manufacture and distribute engineered fasteners under the SPAX brand for the construction market, the TRUFAST brand for the commercial roofing industry and the RODENHOUSE brand for exterior building envelopes and facades.

January 27, 2023 - In 1823, ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO was the first German company to start the industrial production of screws. The company acronym ABC becomes a recognized brand for fasteners of the highest quality. ABC quickly becomes a household name in various industries. First exports prove the beginning success.

July 6, 2024 - Altenloh, Brinck & Co (ABC), headquartered in the Milspe district of Ennepetal, is Germany's oldest screw factory. ABC is internationally known for its Spax screw brand. The companies of the group are manufacturers of fastening and plastics technology and produce around 50 million screws a day.

t: Altenloh, Brinck & Co. Celebrates 200 Year Anniversary | SPAX US
s: Bryan, OH, July 2023 ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO (ABC) is celebrating an unbelievable milestone of two centuries of existence! Founded in 1823 in the town now known as Ennepetal, Germany, ABC was the first in that country to produce screws on an industrial scale and looks back on a long tradition…

t: 200 Jahre ABC sind 200 Gründe für SPAX
s: 200 years ago, ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO was the first German company to start the industrial production of screws. That was the beginning of an eventful history. The global brand SPAX was born from this origin.

t: Multi-Purpose Construction Screw Company - SPAX US
s: The separate TRUFAST® and ABC US business entities are combined to form ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO. US, INC., headquartered in Bryan, Ohio. Here, both the TRUFAST® and SPAX® brands of fasteners are manufactured for the North American building materials and construction market.

t: Spax, des produits pour faciliter la vie des bricoleurs
s: Spax est une marque du groupe d'entreprises ABC qui trouve ses racines dans l'entreprise allemande ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO qui fut la première société de production industrielle de vis en Allemagne dès 1823.

t: Altenloh, Brinck & Co. US, Inc. | LinkedIn
s: ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO. US, INC. (ABC US) is part of the ALTENLOH, BRINCK & CO. Group headquartered in Ennepetal, Germany and is responsible for the manufacture, sales, and distribution of its TRUFAST® and SPAX® brands of engineered fasteners for the North American construction market.
